category.title: Theft-Larceny
category.description: unlawful taking of property without force violence or fraud

category.title: Motor Vehicle Theft
category.description: theft/attempted theft of a motor vehicle

category.title: Violence
category.description: (assault, murder, homicide, rape, robbery, sex offenses)

category.title: Murder
category.description: Killing a human being in a willful and non-negligent manner

category.title: Robbery
category.description: attempt/taking of property by force or threat of violence

category.title: Quality of Life Crimes
category.description: curfew, disorderly conduct, drug law, forgery/counterfeiting, fraud, liquor law, runaways, sex offenses, vandalism, vagrancy

category.title: Disorderly Conduct
category.description: potentially threatening to self or others

category.title: Drug law violation
category.description: violation of local, state, federal law prohibiting specfic drugs

category.title: Vagrancy
category.description: failing to maintain a verifiable mailing address; excessive time wandering around in public
